questions.question: What is the primary color of the visible product surface?

What style best describes the product's overall aesthetic?
What appears to be the method of attachment to a surface?

Is the visible part of the product primarily curved or angular in its form?
What is the dominant visual characteristic of the product's surface?
What single word describes the product's general appearance?
